Package command

Class UpdateProfileCommand

Object
command.UpdateProfileCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICommand
Direct Known Subclasses:
UpdateConsumerProfileCommand, UpdateEntertainmentProviderProfileCommand
public abstract class UpdateProfileCommand
extends Object
implements ICommand
UpdateProfileCommand contains common behaviour shared between profile update commands

  • Method Details

    • isProfileUpdateInvalid

      protected boolean isProfileUpdateInvalid​(Context context, String oldPassword, String newEmail)
      Common error checking method for all profile updates.
      Parameters:
      context - object that provides access to global application state
      oldPassword - password before the change, which must match the account's password
      newEmail - specified email address to use for the account after the change
      Returns:
      True/false based on whether the profile update is valid

    • getResult

      public Boolean getResult()
      Description copied from interface: ICommand
      Get the result from the latest run of the command.
      Specified by:
      getResult in interface ICommand
      Returns:
      True if successful and false otherwise
